name: Ripple
description: Minimalistic logic puzzle game that's easy to understand, yet hard to master! Are you new to puzzle games, a seasoned veteran or an achievement hunter / trader? Solve some Ripples!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 @ 1.8 GHz / AMD Athlon XP 1800+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce FX 5200 / ATI Radeon 9200 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Needs a screen aspect ratio of 3:2 or higher
